elements.name: Add products to Cart and verify details

steps.name: the user is on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user clicks on Products tab
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise - All Products"
the user should see the heading "All Products"
the user hovers over the first product and clicks Add to cart
the user clicks on Continue Shopping button on Added modal
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise - All Products"
the user hovers over the second product and clicks Add to cart
the user clicks on View Cart button on Added modal
the user verifies that both products are added to Cart
the user verifies their prices, quantity and total price

elements.name: Add specific number of products to the cart and Verify the quantity

steps.name: the user is on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user clicks View Product for any product on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise - Product Details"
the user increases the quantity to 4
the user saves the product name, quantity and price
the user clicks Add to cart button on the product detail page
the user clicks View Cart button on the Added Modal
the user verifies that the product is displayed in cart page with exact quantity
the user is on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user adds products to the cart
the user clicks on Continue Shopping button on Added modal
the user clicks on Cart tab
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise - Checkout"
the user clicks X button corresponding to a particular product
the user verifies that the product is removed from the cart

elements.name: Add to cart from Recommended items

steps.name: the user is on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user scrolls to the bottom of the page
the user should see the heading "recommended items"
the user clicks on Add To Cart on a recommended product
the user clicks on View Cart button on Added modal
the user verifies that the product is displayed on the cart page

elements.name: Verify address details in checkout page

steps.name: the user is on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user clicks on SignupLogin tab
the user fills all details in Signup and creates an account
the user verifies 'ACCOUNT CREATED!'
the user clicks Continue button
the user should see the heading 'Logged in as username'
the user adds products to the cart
the user clicks on Cart tab
the user verifies that the cart page is displayed
the user clicks Proceed To Checkout button
the user verifies that the delivery address is the same as the address filled at the time of registration of account
the user verifies that the billing address is the same as the address filled at the time of registration of account
the user clicks on "Delete Account" tab
the user verifies 'ACCOUNT DELETED!'
the user clicks Continue button

elements.name: Download invoice after purchase an order

steps.name: the user is on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user adds products to the cart
the user clicks on Continue Shopping button on Added modal
the user clicks on Cart tab
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise - Checkout"
the user clicks Proceed To Checkout button
the user clicks RegisterLogin button on Checkout modal
the user should see the heading "New User Signup!"
the user enters name and email address
the user clicks Signup button
the user should see the heading "Enter Account Information"
the user fills details: Title, Name, Email, Password, Date of birth
the user selects checkbox 'Sign up for our newsletter!'
the user selects checkbox 'Receive special offers from our partners!'
the user fills details: First name, Last name, Company, Address, Address2, Country, State, City, Zipcode, Mobile Number
the user clicks Create Account button
the user verifies that 'Account Created!' is visible
the user clicks Continue button
Logged in as Mr. with full Name should be visible
the user clicks on Cart tab
the user clicks Proceed To Checkout button
the user verifies Address Details and Review Your Order
the user enters a description in comment text area and clicks Place Order
the user enters payment details: Name on Card, Card Number, CVC, Expiration date
the user clicks Pay and Confirm Order button
the user verifies success message 'Congratulations! Your order has been confirmed!'
the user clicks Download Invoice button
the user verifies that invoice is downloaded successfully
the user clicks Continue button
the user clicks Delete Account button
the user verifies that 'Account Deleted!' is visible

elements.name: User fills and submits a contact us form successfully

steps.name: the user is on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user clicks on Contact us tab
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise - Contact Us"
the user should see the heading "Get In Touch"
the user enters their name, email, subject, and message
the user uploads a file
the user clicks the OK button
the user clicks the Submit button
the success message "Success! Your details have been submitted successfully." should be visible on contact us page

arguments.val: "Success! Your details have been submitted successfully."

steps.name: the user clicks the Home button
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user is on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user should see following tabs:
the user should see following headings:
the user should Automation Exercise Logo
the user is on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user clicks on Test Cases tab
the user should see page title "Automation Practice Website for UI Testing - Test Cases"

arguments.val: "Automation Practice Website for UI Testing - Test Cases"

elements.name: View Products through Category and Subcategory

steps.name: the user is on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user should see the heading "Category"
the user should see following categories on the left side bar:
the user clicks on 'Women' category
the user clicks on any sub-category link under 'Women' category, for example: 'Dress'
the user verifies that the category page is displayed
the user should see the heading which include both category and sub category
the user clicks on 'Men' category
the user clicks on any sub-category link under 'Men' category, for example: 'Jeans'
the user verifies that the category page is displayed
the user should see the heading which include both category and sub category

elements.name: Verify Scroll Up using 'Arrow' button and Scroll Down functionality

steps.name: the user is on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user scrolls down the page to the bottom
the user should see the heading 'Subscription'
the user clicks on the arrow at the bottom right side to move upward
the user verifies that the page is scrolled up and 'Full-Fledged practice website for Automation Engineers' text is visible on screen

elements.name: Verify Scroll Up without 'Arrow' button and Scroll Down functionality

the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user scrolls down the page to the bottom
the user should see the heading 'Subscription'
the user scrolls up the page to the top

elements.name: Verify All Products and product detail page

steps.name: the user is on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user clicks on Products tab
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise - All Products"
the products list is visible
the user clicks on View Product of the first product
the user should be landed on the product detail page
the following details should be visible:
the user is on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user clicks on Products tab
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise - All Products"
the user enters a product name in the search input and clicks the search button
the page url including the product name should be correct
the user should see the heading "Searched Products"
all products related to the search should be visible
the user is on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user clicks on Products tab
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise - All Products"
the user should see the heading "Brands"
the user verifies that Brands are visible under Brands heading:
the user clicks on any brand name
the user verifies that they are navigated to the brand page
the user should see that the brand products are displayed

elements.name: Search Products and Verify Cart After Login

steps.name: the user is on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user clicks on Products tab
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise - All Products"
the user enters a product name in the search input and clicks the search button
the user should see the heading 'Searched Products'
all products related to the search should be visible
the user adds those products to cart
the user clicks on Cart tab
the user verifies that products are visible in cart
the user clicks on SignupLogin tab
the user enters correct email address
the user enters correct password
the user clicks login button
the user clicks on Cart tab
the user verifies that products are visible in cart
the user is on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user clicks on Products tab
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise - All Products"
the user clicks on View Product button on any product
the user verifies a heading text 'Write Your Review' to be visible
the user enters name, email, and review
the user clicks Submit button under review form
the user verifies success message 'Thank you for your review.'
the user is on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user clicks on SignupLogin tab
the user should see the heading "New User Signup!"
the user enters name and email address
the user clicks Signup button
the user should see the heading "Enter Account Information"
the user fills details: Title, Name, Email, Password, Date of birth
the user selects checkbox 'Sign up for our newsletter!'
the user selects checkbox 'Receive special offers from our partners!'
the user fills details: First name, Last name, Company, Address, Address2, Country, State, City, Zipcode, Mobile Number
the user clicks Create Account button
the user verifies that 'Account Created!' is visible
the user clicks Continue button
Logged in as Mr. with full Name should be visible
the user clicks Delete Account button
the user verifies that 'Account Deleted!' is visible
the user clicks Continue button
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user is on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user clicks on SignupLogin tab
the user should see the heading "New User Signup!"
the user enters a name and an already registered email address
the user clicks Signup button
the user verifies that the error 'Email Address already exist!' is visible
the user is on the home page
the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user scrolls down to the footer
the user should see the heading "Subscription"
the user enters an email address in the input field and clicks the arrow button
the success message 'You have been successfully subscribed!' should be visible on subscribe page

the user should see page title "Automation Exercise"
the user clicks on Cart tab
the user scrolls down to the footer
